text: @realDonaldTrump Wait.. what happened to your declaration of the “coronavirus hoax” pal? Don’t you and your jackass son have to stick to your jackassery conspiracy theories? Your whole family perpetuates lies and fear. And your “great economy” is now in the shitter.
